content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Dashboard configuration checks for Correlated Intelligence in Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection September 20, 2024 – The Configuration Health tab on the Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection Dashboard is updated to include checks related to Correlated Intelligence, providing administrators with a streamlined overview of their security configurations.
